      ZKClusterWatcher(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> configuration, ZKMonitorCallback zkMonitorListener)
      Constructs a Zookeeper watcher instance that monitors Zookeeper cluster and notify clients when Zookeeper node status has changed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZKClusterWatcher

        public ZKClusterWatcher(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> configuration,
                        ZKMonitorCallback zkMonitorListener)
        Constructs a Zookeeper watcher instance that monitors Zookeeper cluster and notify clients when Zookeeper node status has changed.
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration
        zkMonitorListener - a listener implementd by the client to be notified when zookeeper quorum event occurs
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if configuration is null or any of arguments properties is missing or invalid

        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration

    • Method Detail

      • getCluster

        public ZKCluster getCluster()
        Get Zookeeper cluster A polling mechanism could be implemented by clients to get Zookeeper cluster status.
        Returns:
        ZKCluster
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() was not called.

      • start

        Start monitoring

        Stop monitoring

      • process

        public void process(org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent event)
        It listen to Zookeeper session events. It is called automatically by Zookeeper when a zookeeper session issues an event.
        Specified by:
        process in interface org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
        Parameters:
        event - issued by zookeeper session
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() was not called.

      • getHealth

        public ZKClusterHealthName getHealth()
        Get the general health of zookeeper cluster. If zookeeper cluster has not quorum or at least a node is unreachable then it returns NO_QUORUM or WARNING respectively. Otherwise it returns OK.
        Returns:
        ZKClusterHealthName zookeeper status health
        Throws:
        ZKMonitorException - if start() was not called.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() was not called.
        See Also:
        for status name meaning
